text: Geminia is a monotypic genus of Burmese huntsman spiders containing the single species, Geminia sulphurea. It was first described by Tamerlan Thorell in 1897, and is found in Myanmar. ==See also== * List of Sparassidae species ==References== Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Sparassidae Category:Spiders of Asia Category:Taxa named by Tamerlan Thorell
title: Geminia
